text: whether you're a monetization platform
helping publishers with advertising
revenue or an ad agency managing
campaigns Amazon Web Services provides
building blocks you can quickly assemble
to support virtually any workload for
your digital advertising business with
reduced time and money spent on
infrastructure you can focus on building
new products and features with AWS s
economies of scale you can increase
operational efficiency and save money
without any upfront investment or
ongoing commitments adjusting workloads
as your needs change while paying only
for what you use with reduced
infrastructure cost and effort you can
focus on making differentiated products
like sophisticated targeting algorithms
or new engaging ad formats and spin up
instances in minutes to test concepts or
deploy new features AWS is global
availability zones and regions edge
locations and data caching options help
you move quickly in every major market
globally as demand grows AWS is
scalability lets you grow your business
seamlessly deploying and expanding
anywhere you want with the AWS global
infrastructure whether you are
participating in a real-time bidding
process or trying to deliver add content
you can minimize latency and maximize
your opportunity to realize revenue
understanding audiences and targeting
the right people with the right message
at the right time is critical
leverage AWS to build a scalable
analytics pipeline and consistently
track analyze and archive data to
optimize your algorithm to increase
targeting accuracy AWS has the broadest
and the most advanced services for every
major workload Amazon Kinesis simplifies
building streaming applications and
analyzing rapidly moving data analytic
services like Amazon EMR redshift and
Athena give you deep insight into data
at any scale and AWS is machine learning
offerings can even take your analysis
one step further no matter what your
project is AWS gives you flexibility to
choose exactly what you need start your
AWS cloud journey today
